text: 12.33 Mat 19.21, Luk 18.22, Apo 2.45, 4.34 Tap nɨbi mɨdeb okok tawɨl mani dɨl, binɨb tap ma mɨdeb okok kɨlop ñɨnɨmɨb agak. Anɨgɨnɨgabɨm, mani tap teplep tek yenɨgab, God man ne alaŋ agak. Ma kul gɨnɨgab agak. Bɨ si dep ogɨnap ma si dɨnɨgabal agak. Kɨchɨl gɨlobɨd ma ñɨŋɨnɨgab agak. Mel yɨbɨl, pelnep yenɨgab agak.
